original_title: Sri Lanka Treasuries yields ease across maturities, all bills sold
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – The debt office sold 80 billion rupees in 3-month bills at 19.90 percent, down by 6 basis points from a week earlier, after offering 80 billion rupees.
55 billion rupees in 6-month bills were sold at 17.57 percent, down by 12 basis points from a week earlier after offering 45 billion rupees.
45 billion rupees of 12-month bills were sold at 14.16 percent, down by 13 basis points from a week earlier after offering 45 billion. (Colombo/Aug02/2023)
